topics.body:
So apparently congress has utterly fucked up hard.  After everyone has dissected why Eric Cantor lost here's the short version:
Just cause you're a incumbent doesn't you can't lose re-election.  What I mean by this is that the problem right now is that congress believes that they will get re-elected no matter what and well turns out that 's wrong.
